item.title: CUSTA - GRANDMASTER MOIRA GAMEPLAY TIPS | How To Improve As Moira Guide - Overwatch Season 7

meta.summary:
b"Today we are back again trying a top 500 tip Moira video because I think its fun and people just love Moira it seems. Today we are talking about how the grandmaster Moira player can carry his competitive games in season 7 overwatch competitive ranked mode guide for overwatch season 7 placement matches and overwatch season 7 changes. Going over some Moira season 7 tips and guide or whatever you want to call it. I hope that these tips can help to have you guys learn how to improve as Moira and hope this works as a mini Moira guide tip trick thing for all that want to improve as her. Anyways, thanks! 




More GM Gameplay Tip Videos Here! : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df



Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SHwT0LtCW1U
Thumbnail:https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DNvQmOxW0AEpElo.jpg
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-remember you have a healing orb, dont damage orb unless you have a guarenteed kill with it or both teams poking
-have your damage beam held at all times, even if you get a tick of damage thats a bit more healing you can do
-always shoot your healing orb before you ult, it makes you never die
-while ulting, focus healing or killing the enemy mercy. Dont go for others
-vs hitscan comps, try to have your team group up so you can just outheal the damage
-dont always try to top people off with your healing, getting a kill can stop more damage than healing will give
-the second you start taking big damage, just e heal and shift out. dont risk your life at all
-when your team is down a man, just spam your damage orb to try to get your ult before your teammates get back
-dont waste your ult to try to heal through multiple enemy ults
-you can ult early and focus on a nanoed person or genji ult
-he stays pretty far back behind his team, there is no point in getting close
-when somebody gets hooked or soemthing, go for a healing orb spam healing before they actually get moved. 
-if the enemy has a flanker , just spam your right click at them. you will never kill them but you stop the damage
-ulting at the start of the fight allows for your teammates to go in almost risk free, nice way to engage

-defense for moira is harder, you need to go for more damage than you would think
-he goes for a lot of damage orbs on defense to try to get an early ult to stop a teamwipe
-he lets the other support top people off and heal him up, not using his healing orb unles he needs to
-if you are half hp in a fight and think you may be able to win, just ult. Its not an ult you need to save
-throw a damage orb into zarya ult and then ult if you have no other combos, otherwise, dont waste it
-he ults a full hp mercy and can kill her. If the enemy mercy doesnt have ult, she is dead
-you dont really want to ult until you get low on healing, try to use most of the bar and then ult
-your ult esentually fully charges your ult from the damage it doesn, keep in mind that extra leaing
-you can jump on point to stall for some time, then back off and heal
-Just try to keep yourself alive, and dont overextend to suck people to death


======================================================================

TIPS I WROTE DOWN FROM THE VIDEO:
-


======================================================================





How GRANDMASTER Players DESTORY with Moira - Overwatch Top 500 PRO Tricks Overwatch - 20 TricksMoira Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't! Some tips and tricks to master Moira! Overwatch - 7 OP Tips and Tricks Grandmaster Players use every game! Moira overwatch, Moira guide top 500 tips and tricks Moira master gameplay, how Moira is played, CUSTA gameplay Moira overwatch competitive esports vod grandmaster Moira tricks grandmaster top 500 Moira, overwatch top 700 Moira esports vod Moira esports gameplay, grandmaster Moira tricks top 500 tricks tips, how to play Moira, Moira season 7, overwatch competitive season 7 Moira, Moira season 7 offense, Moira season 7 defense, overwatch season 7 Moira guide overwatch,Moira tricks,Tricks Moira Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't,Tricks Moira Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't overwatch,overwatch Tricks Moira Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't,tricks grandmasters abuse that you dont,overwatch tricks grandmasters abuse that you dont,grandmaster tricks overwatch,Moira grandmaster,Moira top 500 trick,How GRANDMASTER Players DESTROY with Moira,Moira season 7 competitive,Moira vod,grandmaster, Moira CUSTA, CUSTA Moira, best Moira, strongest Moira, best Moira player, overwatch CUSTA

item.title: Advanced Moira Guide by Top 500 Moira Main

meta.summary:
b"Follow me on twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/tesla_ow

I decided to finally compile all the videos I've been collecting for the past year or so into a formal Moira guide. I have recently become consistent with Moira around 4300 and feel I have a lot to teach about the strategies I use in competitive play.

Sensitivity: 800 DPI 3.5 In-game 38 Scoped

Time Marks:
1:02 Character Overview
1:41 Moira's Role
2:15 Healing
4:12 Combination Healing
5:22 Damage
6:35 Combination Damage
7:41 Self Sustain
8:23 Melee
9:10 Crouch and Strafe
9:41 Shields
10:21 Orb Usage
12:12 Healing Orb
12:57 Damage Orb
13:52 Early Damage Orbs
14:56 Fade
15:54 Fade Mechanics
17:31 Offensive Coalescence
18:29 Defensive Coalescence
19:03 Hybrid Coalescence
20:12 Importance of Aim
22:35 Target Prioritization
23:08 Positioning
24:21 Team Composition
26:08 Healer Pairing
28:20 Animation Cancels
29:25 Suboptimal Pairing
30:32 End Game Statistics
32:23 Hero Matchups

item.title: 100+ USEFUL MOIRA FADE JUMPS on EVERY MAP

meta.summary:
b'The Moira vertical jump - done by jumping off of knee to shoulder height objects in the game can give you insane vertical mobility when using her fade ability. This is also called the "Fade Tech" jump. It's a little bit of an advanced trick, but mastering this will increase her mobility and raise her skill cap. You can find a ton more at https://reddit.com/r/Moirarollouts

Here are time stamps for some USEFUL and PRACTICAL jumps on every map in the game.

2CP (Assault) Maps

Hanamura - 1:01 
Horizon Lunar Colony - 1:27
Temple of Anubis - 1:37
Volskaya Industries - 2:03

Hybrid Maps

Blizzard World - 2:54
Eichenwalde - 3:31
Hollywood - 3:56
King's Row - 4:18
Numbani - 4:42

Escort (Payload) Maps

Dorado - 5:18
Junkertown - 5:53
Route 66 - 6:17
Watchpoint: Gibraltar - 6:53

Control (KOTH) Maps

Illios - 7:18
Lijiang Tower - 7:51
Nepal - 8:25
Oasis - 9:05
